def put_lifecycle_configuration(self, lifecycle_rules): """ Apply a lifecycle configuration to the bucket. The lifecycle configuration can be used to archive or delete the objects in the bucket according to specified parameters, such as a number of days.
:param lifecycle_rules: The lifecycle rules to apply. """ try: self.bucket.LifecycleConfiguration().put( LifecycleConfiguration={'Rules': lifecycle_rules}) logger.info( "Put lifecycle rules %s for bucket '%s'.", lifecycle_rules, self.bucket.name) except ClientError: logger.exception( "Couldn't put lifecycle rules for bucket '%s'.", self.bucket.name) raise
